beers.name: HEFEWEIZEN
beers.description: Easy to drink with a lingering, pleasant aftertaste. A rich, yolky-orange wheat beer, featuring the aroma of clove and fruit in perfect balance; refreshing with a hint of mandarin-orange-like acidity.

beers.name: KÖLSCH
beers.description: A refreshing, mildly spicy, mildly fruity ale. A happy beer, easy to drink, makes you want to have glass after glass. (Contains wheat).

beers.name: HELLES lAGER
beers.description: Our flagship Helles is the ultimate easy-to-drink beer. Refreshing with an aroma of grain and the pleasant floral and citrus of Saphir hops.

beers.name: VIENNA LAGER
beers.description: Mozart played full-volume in the brewhouse as the Dovetail Vienna Lager was born. Copper in color, with a warm, malty character, it is brewed with 100% Vienna malt and Styrian Golding hops.

beers.name: PILSNER
beers.description: This pilsner is a showcase for Czech Saaz hops, brewed with 100% Pilsner malt and “heaven’s water”—a Chicago-recreated version of the soft water of Plzen. It features the spiciness of the hop, as well as a very smooth and hospitable bitterness, and a lovely caramelization from the triple-decoction process.

beers.name: RAUCHBIER
beers.description: Our version of the Bamberg classic. Dark with reddish tones and an off- white head of rocky foam standing above the rim of the glass; as you bring it to your nose, you feel like you are eating a chocolate bar in a smokehouse, full and rich with generous hopping to balance the flavor of beechwood smoked malt.

beers.name: LAGER
beers.description: A golden, malty, rich, creamy complex lager with aroma of malt and fresh hops. Easy to drink with a lingering pleasant aftertaste and foam that stands like a cloud above the rim of the glass; lacing at every sip. Only available on draft at the taproom, or at bars and restaurants—canned once, but never again!

beers.name: Rauchdoppelbock
beers.description: Seasonal release: RELEASED IN WINTER, AFTER THE NEW YEAR

beers.name: maibock
beers.description: RELEASED IN SPRINGMeant to be celebrated and enjoyed at Mayfestiversary, this beer was brewed in January and then hibernated for 3 months (just like us!) Now the day has come to spring forward and rejoice! Celebrate and savor this honey-toned beer: pale, light and exuberant.

beers.name: festbier
beers.description: Seasonal release: RELEASED IN EARLY FALL

beers.name: holiday bock
beers.description: It's the most wonderful time for a beer! This beer is brewed for winter fun. It’s a 100% barley malt lager with reddish tones from the generous addition of caramel malt. It’s a darker, higher strength beer perfect for colder weather, sure to warm you after a snowball fight or bring more happy to a lively party.

beers.name: ALTBIER
beers.description: Literally, the “old style” of German beers. Malty, bitter and balanced. A top-fermented beer that undergoes cold-conditioning for a crisp, clean finish. .3L served in a traditional stange for that true Altstadt feel!

beers.name: GRODZISKIE
beers.description: Pale in color, with a spirited effervescence, Grodziskie is the specialty beer of its namesake town in Poland. More carbonated than Hefe and lower in alcohol, this 100% smoked wheat beer features light, citrus-like overtones with a surprising glimmer of spice and smoke.

beers.name: CZECH DARK LAGER
beers.description: Our Pilsner in a sweater. Inspired by JP's afternoon in Prague drinking at U Fleku—a brewery that’s been making dark lager more than 500 years—Dovetail’s CDL is a showcase of chocolate, bread crust, caramel and subtle coffee roast. Triple-decocted, open-fermented, and lagered for a long time just like how that do it in that other Pilsen.

beers.name: SAISON
beers.description: Brewed with 100% Pilsner malt, French Strisselspalt and Hallertau Blanc hops, and an expressive Belgian yeast, this beer is a rustic expression of straw and hay, grass and white grape aromas, while open-fermentation nurtures notes of bubblegum and black pepper.
